name: Stardust the Unicorn
summary: A small platformer inspired by old-school speed games. Help Stardust rescue his friends from the Kelpie Kingdom using his speed, horn, and magic dusts that grant him different abilities. Jump around, run, and use your abilities to advance through the levels. Watch out for obstacles and use different dusts to help you progress. Different dusts grant you different powers, which you can use to your advantage. Try them all and use your favorite one.
